snippet: While a trial for George Zimmerman will most likely not start for months, if ever, some in the news media are already predicting blanket coverage.
abstract: Trial for George Zimmerman, charged with second degree murder in the shooting death of Trayvon Martin, will most likely not start for months, if ever, but some in the news media are already predicting blanket coverage; media has seized on the story with a ferocity that has drawn comparisons to the Casey Anthony trial and that of O J Simpson.
lead_paragraph: While a trial for George Zimmerman will most likely not start for months, if ever, some in the news media are already predicting blanket coverage.

headline.seo: George Zimmerman Trial Could Start a News Swarm
headline.main: Trial in Martin Case, Filled With High Emotion, Would Draw a News Swarm
headline.print_headline: Trial in Martin Case, Filled With High Emotion, Would Draw a News Swarm
